Plot: After learning of her husband's infidelities, a housewife invites an itinerant lesbian to move in with them. None of their lives will ever be the same again.
Title: French Twist
Writer: Patrick Aubrée, Josiane Balasko, Telsche Boorman (story)
Actors: Victoria Abril, Josiane Balasko, Alain Chabat, Ticky Holgado
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 5 nominations.
